segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on those cookies that he doesn’t realize how wobbly that stool is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he’s going to fall right onto that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is just waiting, her hand outstretched like she’s begging for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their teamwork, even if it’s mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so sneaky, and the woman has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before or if this is their first cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and I’m holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a risky game they’re playing, and I’m not sure who’s going to win.
segments.speaker: PAR
